relatedBlades.title: 60+ recognitions by top 3 analyst firms
relatedBlades.copy: See how Cloudflare unifies security, application, and network solutions to transform organizations and power the future of the Internet.

features.title: Cloudflare is the only new vendor in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE)
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report. We believe our recognition validates our commitment to continue advancing our Zero Trust platform to help secure hybrid work.

imageAssetFile.title: Gartner Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a Strong Performer in "The Forrester Wave™: Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023
features.description: Cloudflare cites continued disruptive momentum in the SSE market, receiving the highest scores possible, 5.0/5.0, in the innovation, roadmap, pricing flexibility & transparency, and hybrid workforce enablement & protection criteria.

imageAssetFile.title: Forrester Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 IDC MarketScape for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
features.description: IDC cites Cloudflare's "aggressive product strategy to support enterprise security needs." We believe our recognition validates our approach to help businesses of any size get started with Zero Trust and secure access for any user to any resource, without VPNs.

imageAssetFile.title: IDC Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Superior experience
features.description: By combining a wide range of services powered by one of the most expansive networks on the planet, Cloudflare simplifies the ability to deliver a superior digital experience.

features.title: Transcend boundaries
features.description: Our integrated platform transcends traditional boundaries, unifying diverse technologies to power the future of the Internet.

features.title: Easy-to-use solutions
features.description: Experience unparalleled performance, enhanced security, and seamless connectivity with Cloudflare's easy-to-use solutions.

relatedBlades.title: Recognized in over 60 reports across top analyst firms

allAnalystHighlights.description: Forrester Research, Inc. evaluated the most significant providers in the market for Bot Management based on 25-criteria across current offering, strategy, and market presence. According to Forrester, "Cloudflare has vastly improved its bot management…" with a product roadmap that "reflects Cloudflare's goals of more-efficient detection and response."
allAnalystHighlights.title: Cloudflare Named A 'Strong Performer' in The Forrester Wave™ for Bot Management

allAnalystHighlights.description:
Cloudflare is named a LEADER in the 2022 IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Commercial Content Delivery Network Services 2022 Vendor Assessment. (doc #US47652821, March 2022).

According to the IDC MarketScape, "Cloudflare is a highly innovative vendor and continues to invest in its competencies to support advanced technologies such as virtualization, serverless, AI/ML, IoT, HTTP3, 5G and (mobile) edge computing."
allAnalystHighlights.title: Cloudflare Named A 'Leader' in the 2022 IDC MarketScape for WW CDN Services

allAnalystHighlights.description: Forrester Research, Inc. evaluated the most significant providers in the market for edge development platforms based on 10 criteria across compute, data services and web development capabilities. In the report, "The Forrester New Wave™: Edge Development Platforms, Q4 2021" Cloudflare was named a 'Leader'.
allAnalystHighlights.title: Cloudflare recognized as a 'Leader' in The Forrester New Wave for Edge Development Platforms

allAnalystHighlights.description: Forrester Research, Inc. evaluated 11 of the most significant providers in the market for DDoS Mitigation based on 28-criteria across current offering, strategy, and market presence. In the report, "The Forrester WaveTM: DDoS Mitigation Solutions, Q1 2021" Cloudflare was named a 'Leader'.
allAnalystHighlights.title: The Forrester Wave™: DDoS Mitigation Solutions, Q1 2021

allAnalystHighlights.description: This research report from Enterprise Management Associates (EMA) provides a practical guide for IT and networking professionals seeking to understand SASE and the providers who are furthest along in making it a reality.
allAnalystHighlights.title: EMA Report: Availability and Buying Options in the Emerging SASE Market

allAnalystHighlights.description: Cloudflare is named as the innovation leader in the Global Holistic Web Protection Market for 2020 by Frost & Sullivan.
allAnalystHighlights.title: Frost & Sullivan Frost Radar™: Global Holistic Web Protection Market

allAnalystHighlights.description: Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) platforms replace broken corporate perimeters with individual access boundaries around your most critical applications. We're excited that Gartner has named Cloudflare as a representative ZTNA-as-a-Service vendor in the 2020 Gartner Market Guide for Zero Trust Network Access.
allAnalystHighlights.title: Cloudflare recognized as a representative vendor in Gartner's 2020 Market Guide for Zero Trust Network Access

allAnalystHighlights.description: Cloudflare has been named as a leading provider of Zero Trust Access (ZTA) in the Omdia Market Radar for Zero Trust Access. In the report, Omdia explores the rise of Zero Trust Access as a response to shortcomings in VPNs, and the rapid expansion of remote work and cloud computing.
allAnalystHighlights.title: Cloudflare named a Leader in the Omdia Market Radar for Zero Trust Access report
